title: Employer Branding (EB)
description: Developed employer branding on social platforms: Sourced and created content, images, and videos for TikTok - Designed materials to support recruitment activities.

title: Content Creator
description: Created content for two doctor brands on Facebook, Instagram, and TikTok; Managed and edited content across channels to ensure brand consistency and increase product recognition; Collaborated with Design, Editor, and Ads teams to produce content and run advertisements; Managed Fanpage and TikTok; Supported filming, photography, and livestreaming; Analyzed aesthetic market trends.

title: Content Creator
at: Institute for Research and Development of Southeast Asian Culture and Arts Conservation - IRSAC
description: Contributed to developing fanpage strategies, produced communication content for IRSAC's Facebook, and supported the establishment of the Vietnam - ASEAN+ Friendship Association.
